text: This is the instructions for the retro today
*React with an emoji* and round robin on why

*Hash-tag-game* in the thread here:  #liked - good stuff #learned #lacked - want more of #longfor want to happen. Think about the time since last retro and use #hashtags to express yourself. Ex #liked #pairProgramming #longfor #coffeeWithTeam 
3. (5 min) Vote with + for most important. You have three votes
4. (10 min) Copy on channel the one with the most votes

*5-why mob-style* (15 min , ca 2 per person + shift)
We will go round robin working with the five why method. Each post explains “why” on the previous one, starting with the thing we want to fix.
but the typing will be done by the one after the one talking. 
One post per person.

*Brainstorm actions* (10 min)
In the thread of this post!
One idea per post!
Then we will vote again with thumbs up. (Three each) (1 min)
And make the most popular one the actionable and defined task until next time. (5 min)

thread.text:
What did you think of this retrospective?
 :alarm_clock: = Best use of my time 
 :hammer:  = Got some useful tools 
 :poop:  = Rather watch paint dry
